thread.title: ‘You totally #Tucked him’: Tucker Carlson interviews Hartford Mayor Luke Bronin
thread.title_full: ‘You totally #Tucked him’: Tucker Carlson interviews Hartford Mayor Luke Bronin

author: William A.
title: ‘You totally #Tucked him’: Tucker Carlson interviews Hartford Mayor Luke Bronin
text:
‘You totally #Tucked him’: Tucker Carlson interviews Hartford Mayor Luke Bronin Posted at 10:32 pm on February 24, 2017 by William A. 
On Friday night’s show, Tucker Carlson interviewed Hartford Mayor Luke Bronin to discuss sanctuary cities. 
Tweets: . @MayorBronin : I ask [police chief] how much of our crime…is committed by undocumented individuals…answer I get back is virtually none. pic.twitter.com/KbfzWPI3Hh 
— Fox News (@FoxNews) February 25, 2017 . @MayorBronin : "If we find somebody who is an undocumented individual, and that person is a violent criminal, we want that person deported." pic.twitter.com/brsWooxvyO 
— Fox News (@FoxNews) February 25, 2017 
Video:
